data.text: @purpletwts Bruh in my tl Blinks and Onces are fighting over this tour attendees 🙃 https://t.co/wqJF60QDIf
@_sachaaaaaaaa I get what you mean but not hyping is one thing but not hyping cuz of the 2nd fandom only just simply feeds their ego. That's like bowing to bullies out of fear.
@purpletwts own sake and mental health bc being bombarded with negativity is just not good for you

@purpletwts the problem is that the natural instinct is to defend them ofc and in general it just brings so much negativity. one dumb blinks sends honderds of blinks to “old” twice tweets. it’s just exhausting and once’s cant celebrate w/o negativity so we are hestitant to celebrate for our
@_sachaaaaaaaa And why do we care about what any other fandom has to say lol. We are here for Twice, Twice's achievements are our business. If anyone else is in our business then it's their problem.
@purpletwts i mean when we do that one fandom comes with the oh but can you get 400k in attendance and then they’ll bring up irrelevant views, so not worth it imo

@purpletwts The fact that this happened after they restocked a FEW ALBUMS. 

IMAGINE IF THEY RESTOCK ALL THE ALBUMS WITH NOT JUST A FEW AMOUNT🤧. ALL THEIR ALBUMS ARE HIGH DEMAND FOR GOD'S SAKE @jypnation https://t.co/zF9MhvIqBY
Also to think jype doesn't restock Twice albums like are you serious? Twice is your main artist for a reason when will you realize that! 😭 https://t.co/whVvLdRZMU
